QuizQuestions.Title: What keyword is used to indicate the start of a method in Java?
Which of the following is used to read input from the user in Java?
How do you declare a constant variable in Java?
Which loop is suitable when the number of iterations is known?
Which keyword is used to inherit a class in Java?
What is the correct way to comment multiple lines in Java?
What does the 'static' keyword mean in Java?
Options: It indicates that the variable is of dynamic type.
It indicates that a method or variable belongs to the class, not instances.
It specifies a variable to be of floating-point type.
QuizQuestions.CorrectAnswer: It indicates that a method or variable belongs to the class, not instances.

QuizQuestions.Title: Which data type is used to store decimal numbers with single precision in Java?
What does the 'new' keyword do in Java?
Options: It creates a new instance of a class.
It indicates that a method is new.
It is used to declare a new variable.
It is used to indicate a conditional statement.
QuizQuestions.CorrectAnswer: It creates a new instance of a class.
